additionalProperties.title: Tag
additionalProperties.description: Components with no namespace are treated as `tags': any name consisting of alphanumeric characters, `.` and `_` is permitted; the tag is attached to the biome so that either code or data may check for its existence; tag components may not have member fields.

A.title: Format Version
A.description: A version that tells minecraft what type of data format can be expected when reading this file.

B.title: Capped Surface
B.description: Generates surface on blocks with non-solid blocks above or below.

ceiling_materials.title: Ceiling Materials
ceiling_materials.description: Materials used for the surface ceiling.

floor_materials.title: Floor Materials
floor_materials.description: Materials used for the surface floor.

sea_material.title: Sea Material
sea_material.description: Material used to replace air blocks below sea level.

foundation_material.title: Foundation Material
foundation_material.description: Material used to repalce solid blocks that are not surface blocks.

beach_material.title: Beach Material
beach_material.description: Material used to decorate surface near sea level.

C.title: Climate
C.description: Describes temperature, humidity, precipitation, etc.  Biomes without this component will have default values.

top_material.title: Top Material
top_material.description: Controls the block type used for the surface of this biome.

mid_material.title: Mid Material
mid_material.description: Controls the block type used in a layer below the surface of this biome.

sea_floor_material.title: Sea Floor Material
sea_floor_material.description: Controls the block type used as a floor for bodies of water in this biome.

foundation_material.title: Foundation Material
foundation_material.description: Controls the block type used deep underground in this biome.

sea_material.title: Sea Material
sea_material.description: Controls the block type used for the bodies of water in this biome.

sea_floor_depth.title: Sea Floor Depth
sea_floor_depth.description: Controls how deep below the world water level the floor should occur.

F.title: Legacy World Generation Rules
F.description: Additional world generation control applicable only to legacy limited worlds.

G.title: Mesa Surface
G.description: Similar to overworld_surface.  Adds colored strata and optional pillars.

top_material.title: Top Material
top_material.description: Controls the block type used for the surface of this biome.

mid_material.title: Mid Material
mid_material.description: Controls the block type used in a layer below the surface of this biome.

sea_floor_material.title: Sea Floor Material
sea_floor_material.description: Controls the block type used as a floor for bodies of water in this biome.

foundation_material.title: Foundation Material
foundation_material.description: Controls the block type used deep underground in this biome.

sea_material.title: Sea Material
sea_material.description: Controls the block type used for the bodies of water in this biome.

sea_floor_depth.title: Sea Floor Depth
sea_floor_depth.description: Controls how deep below the world water level the floor should occur.

H.title: Mountain parameters
H.description: Noise parameters used to drive mountain terrain generation in Overworld.

steep_material_adjustment.title: Steep material adjustment
steep_material_adjustment.description: Defines surface material for steep slopes.

material.title: Material
material.description: Block type use as steep material.

top_slide.title: Top slide
top_slide.description: Controls the density tapering that happens at the top of the world to prevent terrain from reaching too high.

enabled.title: Enabled
enabled.description: If false, top slide will be disabled. If true, other parameters will be taken into account

I.title: Nether Generation Rules
I.description: Controls how this biome is instantiated (and then potentially modified) during world generation of the nether.

target_temperature.title: Target Temperature
target_temperature.description: Temperature with which this biome should selected, relative to other biomes.

target_humidity.title: Target Humidity
target_humidity.description: Humidity with which this biome should selected, relative to other biomes.

target_altitude.title: Target Altitude
target_altitude.description: Altitude with which this biome should selected, relative to other biomes.

target_weirdness.title: Target Weirdness
target_weirdness.description: Weirdness with which this biome should selected, relative to other biomes.

weight.title: Weight
weight.description: Weight with which this biome should selected, relative to other biomes.

J.title: Nether Surface
J.description: Use default Minecraft Nether terrain generation.

BA.title: Overworld Generation Rules
BA.description: Control how this biome is instantiated (and then potentially modified) during world generation of the overworld.

generate_for_climates.title: Generate For Climates
generate_for_climates.description: Controls the world generation climate categories that this biome can spawn for.  A single biome can be associated with multiple categories with different weightings.

items.title: Weight
items.description: Weight with which this biome should be selected, relative to other biomes in the same category.

BB.title: Overworld Height
BB.description: Noise parameters used to drive terrain height in the Overworld.

BD.title: Molang Number
BD.description: The minecraft molang definition that results in a float.

BC.title: Surface Material Adjustments
BC.description: Specify fine-detail changes to blocks used in terrain generation (based on a noise function).

adjustments.title: Adjustments
adjustments.description: All adjustments that match the column's noise values will be applied in the order listed.

height_range.title: Height Range
height_range.description: Defines a range of noise values [min, max] for which this adjustment should be applied.

top_material.title: Top Material
top_material.description: Controls the block type used for the surface of this biome when this adjustment is active.

mid_material.title: Mid Material
mid_material.description: Controls the block type used in a layer below the surface of this biome when this adjustment is active.

sea_floor_material.title: Sea Floor Material
sea_floor_material.description: Controls the block type used as a floor for bodies of water in this biome when this adjustment is active.

foundation_material.title: Top Materials
foundation_material.description: Controls the block type used deep underground in this biome when this adjustment is active.

sea_material.title: Top Materials
sea_material.description: Controls the block type used in the bodies of water in this biome when this adjustment is active.

noise_range.title: Noise Range
noise_range.description: Defines a range of noise values [min, max] for which this adjustment should be applied.

BE.title: Surface Parameters
BE.description: Control the blocks used for the default Minecraft Overworld terrain generation.

top_material.title: Top Material
top_material.description: Controls the block type used for the surface of this biome.

mid_material.title: Mid Material
mid_material.description: Controls the block type used in a layer below the surface of this biome.

sea_floor_material.title: Sea Floor Material
sea_floor_material.description: Controls the block type used as a floor for bodies of water in this biome.

foundation_material.title: Foundation Material
foundation_material.description: Controls the block type used deep underground in this biome.

sea_material.title: Sea Material
sea_material.description: Controls the block type used for the bodies of water in this biome.

sea_floor_depth.title: Sea Floor Depth
sea_floor_depth.description: Controls how deep below the world water level the floor should occur.

BF.title: Swamp Surface
BF.description: Similar to overworld_surface. Adds swamp surface details.

top_material.title: Top Material
top_material.description: Controls the block type used for the surface of this biome.

mid_material.title: Mid Material
mid_material.description: Controls the block type used in a layer below the surface of this biome.

sea_floor_material.title: Sea Floor Material
sea_floor_material.description: Controls the block type used as a floor for bodies of water in this biome.

foundation_material.title: Foundation Material
foundation_material.description: Controls the block type used deep underground in this biome.

sea_material.title: Sea Material
sea_material.description: Controls the block type used for the bodies of water in this biome.

sea_floor_depth.title: Sea Floor Depth
sea_floor_depth.description: Controls how deep below the world water level the floor should occur.

BG.title: End Surface
BG.description: Use default Minecraft End terrain generation.
